clearText() - Method in class Formatter
Remove all text in the main area.
countLines() - Method in class Formatter
Count lines in main area, considering a line to be one or more characters ending with a newline (or the end of the text).
countWords() - Method in class Formatter
Count words in main area, considering a word to be a number of consecutive non-space characters.
